Name: Dairy Farm Simulator
About the game: Dairy Farm Simulator is a 2D clicker simulator game that is like no other. This game allows you to build a virtual dairy farm. Everything in this game has been researched in great detailed to make sure it is realistic as possible. Game Features Difficulty System. Help System. 5 Realistic Dairy Cow Breads. Herringbone / rotary milking sheds Shop to purchase: Cattle, Vehicles, Feed, Equipment, Land Game Features To Be Worked On During Early Access Difficulty System - (Expanded Upon) Help System. - (Expanded Upon) 5 Realistic Dairy Cow Breads. - (Expanded Upon) Breeding - Natural & Artificial. Herringbone / rotary milking sheds - (Expanded Upon) Shop to purchase: Cattle, Vehicles, Feed, Equipment, Land - (Expanded Upon) Fluctuation market pricing system. Tax System. Events System - Power cuts, Floods, Droughts, Snowing Weather System Grass growing mechanics. (Our Own Propriety System) Region Selection Real Milk Solids mechanics. (Our Own Propriety System) In game statistics. Farmer University / XP Points AI Dairy Farm Players. Dairy Company / Companies Staff Management. Farm Automation. ........ Much More.
